title: Lemon-Marinated Halibut Recipe
full_text:
Lemon-Marinated Halibut Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Active
5 mins
Total
50 mins
Serves
2 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
(8-ounce)
halibut fillets
, skin removed
2
cloves
garlic
, minced
3
tablespoons
freshly squeezed lemon juice
3
tablespoons
olive oil
1/2
teaspoon
kosher salt
1/8
teaspoon
freshly
ground black pepper
Directions
Place fish, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a large Ziplock bag. Move fish around to coat. Let rest in refrigerator for 30 minutes. Preheat oven to 400°F while fish marinates.
Take fish out of bag, shaking off excess, but not all, marinade. Place in a glass baking dish. Roast fish until opaque and flaking, about 18 minutes.
